original_text: But the Jews were jealous, and taking some wicked men of the rabble, they formed a mob, set the city in an uproar, and attacked the house of Jason, seeking to bring them out to the crowd.
korean_text: 그러나 유대인들은 시기하여 저자의 어떤 불량한 사람들을 데리고 떼를 지어 성을 소동하게 하여 야손의 집에 침입하여 그들을 백성에게 끌어내려고 찾았으나

sentences.original_text: and taking some wicked men of the rabble
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 저속한 무리 중에 악한 몇 사람을 데리고

sentences.original_text: set the city in an uproar
and attacked the house of Jason
seeking to bring them out to the crowd
